member.name: M:IdApp.Cv.Transformations.Thresholds.TransformationOperations.AdaptiveThreshold(IdApp.Cv.Matrix{System.Single},System.Single,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a black and white image based on the adaptive threshold levels provided. Each pixel is compared to the average pixel value in a square neighborhood of the pixel.
member.param: If the pixel is below thid threshold compared to the average pixel value in the square neighborhood of the pixel, it is colored black. Otherwise, the pixel is colored white.

member.name: M:IdApp.Cv.Transformations.Thresholds.TransformationOperations.Threshold(IdApp.Cv.Matrix{System.Single},System.Single)
member.summary: Creates a black and white image based on the threshold level provided in . Values at or above the threshold value become 1, and values below become 0.
member.param: Threshold value. If negative, the negative image will be returned using the corresponding positive threshold.

member.name: M:IdApp.Cv.Transformations.Thresholds.TransformationOperations.Threshold(IdApp.Cv.Matrix{System.Single},System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates a black and white image based on the threshold levels provided in and . If Min < Max, values between Min and Max become 1, and values outside of the range become 0. If Min > Max, values between Max and Min become 0 and values outside of the range become 1.

member.name: M:IdApp.Cv.Transformations.Thresholds.TransformationOperations.Threshold(IdApp.Cv.Matrix{System.Int32},System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a black and white image based on the threshold level provided in . Values at or above the threshold value become 1, and values below become 0.
member.param: Threshold value. If negative, the negative image will be returned using the corresponding positive threshold.
